block_condition.description: If specified, sleep will only be prevented if this condition is fulfilled by the bed block.

message.description: The message that will be shown when sleep is prevented this way.

set_spawn_point.description: Determines whether the spawnpoint of the player is set upon right-clicking a bed while being prevented. (similar to what happens when you right-click a bed while it's daytime)

priority.description: Determines the priority of which power will prevent the player to sleep, set their spawn and display a message. The power with `set_spawn_point` set to `true` and the highest `priority` value will be prioritized.
